table.name: gtm_ta_rvc_method
table.description: This table contains the dependent formulae related to RVC expression for a given trade agreement.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insertion.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the user who updated the data.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data update.

columns.name: GTM_TRADE_AGREEMENT_GID
columns.description: Identifies the trade agreement corresponding to the trade agreement's regional value content method.

columns.name: QF_RVC_METHOD_GID
columns.description: Identifies the regional value content method corresponding to the trade agreement's regional value content method.

columns.name: PRIORITY
columns.description: Indicates the priority of the execution to the regional value content methods.
